T02D2133:179a-1: ku la lo k'a n'a tha s'a dha na a'a lo ka n'a ma /
T02D2133:179a-3: rigs kyi 'jig rten mgon po'i sgrub thabs kyi snang ba zhes bya ba /
T02D2133:179a-4: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2133:179a-5: ri bo'i mchog la rab tu reg / sngags kyi gzugs kyis rab tu shar //
T02D2133:179a-6: dri med 'od zer snang bar mdzad //
T02D2133:179a-7: rang bdag de nyid 'phro ba yi //
T02D2133:179a-8: ma lus rigs tshogs rnam pa can //
T02D2133:179a-9: srid pa zhi mdzad 'jig rten dbang //
T02D2133:179a-10: nam mkha' yi ni nyi ma ste //
T02D2133:179a-11: 'od zer rab dmar rgyal gyur cig / gnyis med
T02D2133:179a-12: snang ba sngags kyi bdag / zab cing rgya che'i
T02D2133:179a-13: tshul dang ldan // rigs dang rigs byung rnam grangs kyis //
T02D2133:179a-14: gdul dka' rnams ni rnam par gdul //
T02D2133:179a-15: gang de'i rjes mchog bdag nyid kyis //
T02D2133:179a-16: rig nas khyab bdag rnams kyis gsal //
T02D2133:179a-17: ma lus sems can tshogs rnams la //
T02D2133:179a-18: rnam par dag pas tshim mdzad pa //
T02D2133:179a-19: sngags chen snying po'i tshul 'dzin pa'i //
T02D2133:179a-20: bla ma de ni rgyal gyur cig / dpal ldan rje btsun bhri rga ras //
T02D2133:179a-21: yang dag bdud rtsi cha rtogs nas //
T02D2133:179a-22: de mkhyen rjes rtogs las byung ba'i //
T02D2133:179a-23: gsung gis yongs su legs par 'gro ;
T02D2133:179a-24: / dpal ldan 'jig rten rigs dbang sgras //
T02D2133:179a-25: de nyid brgyad cu rtsa lnga mchog / de don rnam 'grel rab tu gsal //
T02D2133:179a-26: de nyid gsum gyi rim pa sbyor //
T02D2133:179a-27: rang gi rjes rtogs snang ba yis //
T02D2133:179a-28: sgrub thabs snang ba bdag gis brjod //
T02D2133:179a-29: dang por padma'i rigs don shes //
T02D2133:179a-30: slob ma'i gang zag rnam par brtag /'jig rten spyod pa rnam spangs shing //
T02D2133:179a-31: sems nyid dag pas mnyam gzhag pa //
T02D2133:179a-32: bla ma dam pa'i man ngag thob //
T02D2133:179a-33: ting 'dzin bde ba phun sum tshogs //
T02D2133:179a-34: shin tu bde ba'i ngo bo nyid //
T02D2133:179a-35: bag chags dang ni chags pa spangs //
T02D2133:179a-36: sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor ba shes //
T02D2133:179b-0: brtse ba'i bdud rtsis @179b yongs su gang //
T02D2133:179b-2: tshul ldan padma'i rigs las byung //
T02D2133:179b-3: 'di yis spobs par ba thob nas //
T02D2133:179b-4: sgrub pa po yis dben pa'i phyogs //
T02D2133:179b-5: 'jig rten rigs dbang bdag nyid kyi //
T02D2133:179b-6: mtshungs med sngags ni brtsam par bya //
T02D2133:179b-7: sngon du thugs kar chu skyes dmar //
T02D2133:179b-8: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
T02D2133:179b-9: nyid kyi sa bon las byung ba'i //
T02D2133:179b-11: bsgom bya de 'od snang ba yis //
T02D2133:179b-12: sku la sogs pa rjes su dran //
T02D2133:179b-13: de nas thugs pa da las byung ba'i //
T02D2133:179b-15: 'od zer nam mkha'i khams su gnas //
T02D2133:179b-16: mtha' yas rgyal ba rnam blta zhing //
T02D2133:179b-17: bla ma yi dam dkyil 'khor la //
T02D2133:179b-18: de mchod 'od zer lha rnams ni //
T02D2133:179b-19: spro bya de yis kun nas gang //
T02D2133:179b-20: gus pas thal mo sbyar bar bya //
T02D2133:179b-21: dkon mchog gsum la bdag sogs pa zhes //
T02D2133:179b-22: tshigs bcad dam pa lan gsum brjod //
T02D2133:179b-23: de nas sems can la phan byams //
T02D2133:179b-24: gzhan don nges dga' snying rje dang //
T02D2133:179b-25: 'gro rnams bde phyir dga' ba dang //
T02D2133:179b-26: 'gro ba'i skyon la btang snyoms bsten //
T02D2133:179b-27: rang nyid phyi nas 'di kun la //
T02D2133:179b-28: mkhas pas bsam par mi bya'o //
T02D2133:179b-29: phyi rol du ni de mi 'thob //
T02D2133:179b-30: sad dang rmi lam nyams myong las //
T02D2133:179b-31: bag chags sa bon 'ba' zhig gis //
T02D2133:179b-33: so sor snang ba rnam spang ni //
T02D2133:179b-34: sems la de bzhin gsal ba min //
T02D2133:179b-35: de phyir bden med gyur pa yis //
T02D2133:179b-37: srid gsum gnas kyi sgrib kun las //
T02D2133:179b-38: nges par grol bar bsgom par bya //
T02D2133:179b-39: nyi mas mun pa nges bcom ltar //
T02D2133:179b-40: dri med nang du rnam par blta //
T02D2133:179b-41: byang chub sems ni gsal byas nas //
T02D2133:179b-42: byang chub sku ni rab tu 'thob //
T02D2133:179b-43: ma rig las skyes nga rgyal dang //
T02D2133:179b-44: de skyes phung po de bdag nyid //
T02D2133:179b-45: yang dag spyad par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2133:179b-46: gang la sngags ni brjod par bya //
T02D2133:179b-47: mtshams sbyor lung bstan las gsungs pa'i /
T02D2133:179b-48: rigs drug pa yi rang bzhin nyid//
T02D2133:179b-49: tshig drug ba yi sngags 'di yis //
T02D2133:179b-50: de ni bri bar shes bya ste //
T02D2133:179b-51: dang po 'di la aom zhes gcig / stong pa nyid ni gnyis pa ste //
T02D2133:179b-52: gsum pa ye shes zhes gsungs te //
T02D2133:179b-53: bzhi pa la ni rdo rje zhes //
T02D2133:179b-54: lnga pa rang bzhin nyid du bshad //
T02D2133:179b-55: drug pa nga rgyal nyid du brjod //
T02D2133:179b-56: de nas bag chags sa bon las //
T02D2133:180a-0: @180a * // sangs rgyas nyid kyi 'bras bur sgrub //
T02D2133:180a-1: sngags pas gnyis med yid de yis //
T02D2133:180a-2: khams gsum po ni rtogs par bya //
T02D2133:180a-3: sgyu ma'i sprul pa dpag med rnams //
T02D2133:180a-4: phyi rol du ni dmigs par bya //
T02D2133:180a-5: pa da nyi'i dkyil 'khor sa bon las //
T02D2133:180a-7: bgegs la bsgo zhing de nas ni //
T02D2133:180a-8: de yi dbus la rdo rje'i gur //
T02D2133:180a-9: nam mkha'i dbyings su shin tu dkar //
T02D2133:180a-10: steng du sa bon las skyes pa'i //
T02D2133:180a-11: chu skyes dmar po'i za 'bru bzhin //
T02D2133:180a-12: brtse bas chags shing 'od dmar gsal //
T02D2133:180a-13: rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug bdag / hr'im gi sa bon 'od lcags kyus //
T02D2133:180a-14: rang nyid bsgom zhing bsam par bya //
T02D2133:180a-15: bsam gtan rang bzhin yang dag ldan //
T02D2133:180a-16: skad cig nyid kyis rdzogs byang chub //
T02D2133:180a-17: gzugs las zhal ni gcig gyur pa //
T02D2133:180a-18: rdo rje gsum gyi thabs thob phyir //
T02D2133:180a-19: de nyid gsum dang yang dag ldan //
T02D2133:180a-20: 'gro ba gsum zad snying ga mig / sngags gsum sa bon dgod par bya//
T02D2133:180a-21: gang las spyan ni gsum gyur pa //
T02D2133:180a-22: 'od dpag med kyis dbu brgyan pa //
T02D2133:180a-23: zhi ba la sogs las mdzad cing //
T02D2133:180a-24: rol pa las ni lha yi mchog / bdud bzhi'i
T02D2133:180a-25: sbyor rgya yis gdab / grol ba nor bu'i dpal
T02D2133:180a-26: gyis 'khyud // mu tig nor bus rnam par brgyan //
T02D2133:180a-27: rdzogs pa'i byang chub brtan pa thob//
T02D2133:180a-29: gdug pa 'gugs phyir phyag g-yas na //
T02D2133:180a-31: padma'i phyag dang zhags pas mtshan //
T02D2133:180a-32: phyag rgya gcig sbyor rgya yis gdab //
T02D2133:180a-33: grol ba nor bu'i dpal gyis 'khyud //
T02D2133:180a-34: mu tig nor bus rnam par brgyan //
T02D2133:180a-35: rdzogs pa'i byang chub brtan pa thob //
T02D2133:180a-36: sems dpa'i skyil krung legs par bzhugs //
T02D2133:180a-37: phyag rgya'i padma mnyam sbyor las //
T02D2133:180a-38: 'dod lha dang mtshungs gzi brjid dang //
T02D2133:180a-39: sgeg pa'i nyams las skyes pa'i phyir //
T02D2133:180a-40: rnal 'byor ma rnams thugs ni dga' //
T02D2133:180a-41: dngos kun gcig gi gzugs nyid phyir //
T02D2133:180a-42: sna tshogs gzugs kyi sku 'dzin pa ;
T02D2133:180a-43: / nyon mongs chen po'i dgra 'joms pa'i //
T02D2133:180a-44: dpa' bo'i dbang phyug 'jigs chen po //
T02D2133:180a-45: rnal 'byor ma rnams ye shes chus //
T02D2133:180a-46: dbang bskur de yi steng du gang //
T02D2133:180a-47: snying ga'i sa bon lcags kyu yis //
T02D2133:180a-48: ye shes sems dpa' dgug par bya //
T02D2133:180a-49: de bzhin ye shes gcig gnas pa'i //
T02D2133:180b-0: @180b sngags kyi de nyid rab gsal bya //
T02D2133:180b-1: phung po khams dang skye mched rnams //
T02D2133:180b-2: rang bzhin bral zhing mtshan nyid gcig / zab dang brling ba'i bkod pa rnams //
T02D2133:180b-3: bla ma'i zhal gyis brjod par bya //
T02D2133:180b-4: der gyur mchog gi ngag gzugs rnams //
T02D2133:180b-5: srog gi shing rta steng du 'gro //
T02D2133:180b-6: kun rdzob don gyi bya byed rnams //
T02D2133:180b-7: yi ge'i rnam pa nyid las thob //
T02D2133:180b-8: ha yig mtha' la tsheg drag bcas //
T02D2133:180b-9: ri gcig gzhan ni ha yu dang //
T02D2133:180b-10: rdzas gsum sa bon gsum po ni //
T02D2133:180b-11: brgyad cu lnga las bsdu ba gsungs //
T02D2133:180b-12: bskyed pa'i rim pa 'di yis ni //
T02D2133:180b-13: rang lus lha sku'i bdag nyid do //
T02D2133:180b-14: lha dang sngags dang dbyer med cing ;
T02D2133:180b-15: / sngags kyi de nyid bsam gtan bya //
T02D2133:180b-16: de yi mtha' la de brda yi //
T02D2133:180b-17: gnas la lha yi sku ru bsgom //
T02D2133:180b-18: bla ma'i man ngag bka' stsal gsungs //
T02D2133:180b-19: bdag gis de nyid rjes su myong //
T02D2133:180b-20: sngags dang phyag rgya'i sku la 'khyud //
T02D2133:180b-21: dang por mtshan nyid de bzhin sgrub //
T02D2133:180b-22: gnyis gsum gzhan dag de spangs nas //
T02D2133:180b-23: bde chen de la kun khyad 'phags //
T02D2133:180b-24: de bzhin lte ba'i pad mthar yang //
T02D2133:180b-25: sku gsung thugs rnams gsal ba yis //
T02D2133:180b-26: gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rtog pa yi //
T02D2133:180b-27: mtshan ma rnams kyis ma mtshan pa //
T02D2133:180b-28: de thob ro gcig nyams myong gnas //
T02D2133:180b-30: bsgom bya'i mchog gi pha rol phyin //
T02D2133:180b-31: zla ba khu ba'i 'od rab gsal //
T02D2133:180b-32: de mthar longs spyod rdzogs pa thob //
T02D2133:180b-33: gsal bar thob pa khu ba'i bdag / bde chen gnas su 'gro bar byed //
T02D2133:180b-34: nam mkha'i phyag rgya mchog la brten //
T02D2133:180b-35: lhan cig skyes chen gnas zhi ba'i //
T02D2133:180b-36: rang gi don ni yang dag rig / zag pa kun la rnam par grol //
T02D2133:180b-37: dper na sprin med nam mkha' bzhin //
T02D2133:180b-38: de nas smon lam gdab bya gang //
T02D2133:180b-39: gzhan gyi don du rab tu grags //
T02D2133:180b-40: de yi rang bzhin kun rdzob kyi //
T02D2133:180b-41: sngags kun yid kyis bzlas par bya //
T02D2133:180b-42: bdag med chen po de nyid mchog / phung po'i bud shing yang dag sreg /
T02D2133:180b-43: chags sogs sa bon sbyin sreg bya //
T02D2133:180b-44: phyi rol tshogs kyang sbyor ba las //
T02D2133:180b-45: padma'i phyag rgya nam mkha' yi /
T02D2133:180b-47: // phyag rgya rnam rgyas 'od rab gsal //
T02D2133:180b-48: 'jig rten dbang phyug snang ba ni //
T02D2133:180b-49: shes bya spyod lam gtor ma btang //
T02D2133:180b-50: bdag gi de nyid ces bshad pa //
T02D2133:181a-0: bskyed pa'i rim pa sbyor ba @181a * //
T02D2133:181a-2: / de yi de nyid goms bstan nas //
T02D2133:181a-3: sna tshogs pa yi rkyen ni mthong //
T02D2133:181a-4: 'di ni rigs lnga'i rnam pa yi //
T02D2133:181a-5: mngon rdzogs byang chub bsgom par bya //
T02D2133:181a-6: rig pa nyid du gsungs pa yang //
T02D2133:181a-7: da ni lha yi de nyid brjod //
T02D2133:181a-8: rin chen chen po'i yon tan khyim //
T02D2133:181a-9: ye shes yid bzhin nor bu gsal //
T02D2133:181a-10: dpal ldan 'jig rten dbang phyug sku //
T02D2133:181a-11: 'od zer kha dog rnam lnga brten //
T02D2133:181a-12: zhi ba'i don gsungs byang chub ni //
T02D2133:181a-13: rnam snang dkar po 'od dang ldan //
T02D2133:181a-14: bdag nyid gsung pa rang bzhin med //
T02D2133:181a-15: gti mug chen po'i rigs kyi bdag / dbang dgug dag la dmar po ste //
T02D2133:181a-17: sems can drang phyir snying rje can //
T02D2133:181a-18: 'dod chags chen po'i rigs kyi bdag / sngo ser dmar ba zhe sdang ste //
T02D2133:181a-19: don yod grub pa dang mtshungs 'bar /
T02D2133:181a-20: bdag gis de nyid byas nas ni //
T02D2133:181a-21: rnam par zhe sdang skye bo 'gugs //
T02D2133:181a-22: sems can don phyir rgya chen nyid //
T02D2133:181a-23: phrag dog chen po'i rigs kyi bdag / bdud dgra 'joms pa nag po ste //
T02D2133:181a-24: mi bskyod pa ni nam mkhar gnas //
T02D2133:181a-25: 'khor ba'i rtsa don spro ba yi //
T02D2133:181a-26: zhe sdang chen po'i rigs bdag nyid //
T02D2133:181a-27: mtho ris la sogs rengs byed ser //
T02D2133:181a-28: rin chen 'byung ldan dang mtshungs so //
T02D2133:181a-29: phyag rgya rnams brten gzhan don gyis //
T02D2133:181a-30: nga rgyal chen po'i rigs kyi bdag / de bzhin khyod kyis dga' ba che //
T02D2133:181a-31: ye shes lnga yi rnam dbye'o //
T02D2133:181a-32: de ni dag pa'i gzhi la bri //
T02D2133:181a-33: rigs dang kha dog nyams dang ldan //
T02D2133:181a-34: phyag mdog dbu rgyan phun sum tshogs //
T02D2133:181a-35: sngon bzhin mtshan ma bsten la brten //
T02D2133:181a-36: rigs kyi 'jig rten dbang phyug bdag //
T02D2133:181a-37: gang gi las kun 'di yis so //
T02D2133:181a-38: brgyad cu lnga gsal khri shing 'bras //
T02D2133:181a-39: rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnams kyi spyod /
T02D2133:181a-40: de phyir gcig tu bsam gtan dga' //
T02D2133:181a-41: rnal 'byor rol pas kun du chags //
T02D2133:181a-42: bla mar gus pa'i khur gyis bkur //
T02D2133:181a-43: de shes de bzhin rab gsal bya //
T02D2133:181a-44: bla ma dang ni slob ma dag / gzhan du dam tshig nyams par 'gyur //
T02D2133:181a-45: 'di ni ma hi ma zhes pa'i //
T02D2133:181a-46: bsgom pa goms pa'i gsung gis bris //
T02D2133:181a-47: 'dir bsdus mdzes par gyur pa yis //
T02D2133:181a-48: bla ma las 'ongs thob pa yis //
T02D2133:181a-49: rgyal ba'i tshul gyis rigs de nyid //
T02D2133:181b-0: rang gis rjes myong gcig tu @181b rigs //
T02D2133:181b-1: 'jig rten mtha' dag de yis ni //
T02D2133:181b-2: rdzogs pa'i byang chub mchog thob shog / dpal ldan
T02D2133:181b-3: rje btsun rigs kyi 'jig rten mgon po'i sgrub thabs
T02D2133:181b-4: kyi snang ba rje btsun ma hi mas mdzad pa
T02D2133:181b-6: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dharma dhar dang /
